names.bio: Eugene Silvain was born on January 17, 1851 in Bourg-en-Bresse, Ain, France. He was an actor, known for The Passion of Joan of Arc (1928) and Molière, sa vie, son oeuvre (1922). He was married to Louise Silvain. He died on August 21, 1930 in Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône, France.
names.name: Eugene Silvain

filmography.title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
